title: Europe's Migrant Crisis Spreads Ashore As Refugees Enter Bulgaria On Foot
teaser: Desperate refugees from Syria and other strife-torn nations are surging into Europe not just by sea, but also over land from Turkey. They are straining border guards of Bulgaria, one of the poorest nations in the European Union.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
